task.title: How to View Personal Information in MyPack Portal
task.shortdesc: This procedure teaches users how to view or change their personal information in MyPack Portal.

taskbody.prereq: You must log into MyPack and therefore have access to the internet, your NCSU login credentials, and your phone in case Duo-Authentication is required.

step.cmd: You can now view and change your personal information.
step.info: Some personal information you can view and change include:

ul.li: Personal details (student ID number, Legal Name, Preferred Name)
Veterans Information (Militatry Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
